General.Name: Innature Bhd
General.Description: InNature Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in retailing and distribution of cosmetics and personal care products in Malaysia, Vietnam, and Cambodia. It offers skincare, body care, hair care, and make-up products under the Natura, Aesop, and Avon brands. The company distributes its products through retail stores located in shopping malls, high-streets, airport stores, and department stores; and e-commerce websites, as well as third-party online stores. InNature Berhad was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Subang Jaya, Malaysia. InNature Berhad is a subsidiary of Etheco Sdn Bhd.
